control_attributes.Control: AU-6 (9) CORRELATION WITH INFORMATION FROM NONTECHNICAL SOURCES
control_attributes.control_description: The organization correlates information from nontechnical sources with audit information to enhance organization-wide situational awareness.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system maintains reviewer/releaser identity and credentials within the established chain of custody for all information reviewed or released.

Control Statement: The organization correlates information from nontechnical sources with audit information to enhance organization-wide situational awareness.
Control Name: AU-6 (9) CORRELATION WITH INFORMATION FROM NONTECHNICAL SOURCES
